communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) Any and all records reflecting data collected and recorded by the Police Department in accordance with the California Racial and Identity Profiling Act (RIPA) from January 1 - December 31, 2022, and January 1 - December 31 2024. Please provide the raw data in excel or csv format.

2) Any and all reports, records, and analyses created by, for, or at the direction of, the City/Town that pertain to any RIPA data that has been collected by the Police Department from January 1 - December 31, 2022, and January 1 - December 31 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Frank Shinneman

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) Any and all records reflecting data collected and recorded by the Police Department in accordance with the California Racial and Identity Profiling Act (RIPA) from January 1, 2024, through the present. Please provide the raw data in excel or csv format.

2) Any and all reports, records, and analyses created by, for, or at the direction of, the City/Town that pertain to any RIPA data that has been collected by the Police Department since January 1, 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Frank Shinneman

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) Any and all records reflecting data collected and recorded by the Police Department in accordance with the California Racial and Identity Profiling Act (RIPA) from January 1, 2024, through the present. Please provide the raw data in excel or csv format.

2) Any and all reports, records, and analyses created by, for, or at the direction of, the City/Town that pertain to any RIPA data that has been collected by the Police Department since January 1, 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Frank Shinneman

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New Mexico Inspection of Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) By school, the number of student incident reports forwarded or otherwise provided to the New Mexico All Source Intelligence Center and/or Immigration and Customs Enforcement between September 1, 2020 and present; 

1a) and any such reports with student names redacted.

2) All documents indicating, reflecting or referencing any policies, processes, practices, guidance, directives, memoranda and/or recommendations regarding your school district generating, sending and/or transmitting school district documents to any divisions, employees, and/or agents of New Mexico All Source Intelligence Center and/or Immigration and Customs Enforcement between September 1, 2020 and present.

3) all documents received from and/or generated by your school district and sent to, transmitted to, or otherwise made available or accessible to the New Mexico All Source Intelligence Center  and/or Immigration and Customs Enforcement and/or any of their employees or agents between Sept 1 2020 and the present;

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Marina Villeneuve

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) By school, the number of student incident reports forwarded or otherwise provided to the New Mexico All Source Intelligence Center and/or Immigration and Customs Enforcement between September 1, 2020 and present; 

1a) and any such reports with student names redacted.

2) All documents indicating, reflecting or referencing any policies, processes, practices, guidance, directives, memoranda and/or recommendations regarding your school district generating, sending and/or transmitting school district documents to any divisions, employees, and/or agents of New Mexico All Source Intelligence Center and/or Immigration and Customs Enforcement between September 1, 2020 and present.

3) all documents received from and/or generated by your school district and sent to, transmitted to, or otherwise made available or accessible to the New Mexico All Source Intelligence Center  and/or Immigration and Customs Enforcement and/or any of their employees or agents between Sept 1 2020 and the present;

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Marina Villeneuve
